translation.en: They came here to exterminate us.
They took our history and culture.
translation.es: Nos quitaron la historia y la cultura.

translation.en: They covered our landmarks in dying humanity.
translation.es: Cubrieron nuestros monumentos con restos de humanidad.

translation.en: The wail of the dying carried for miles.
translation.es: El lamento de los moribundos se oía a kilómetros.

translation.en: They're building some kind of breeding facility for those that survive.
translation.es: Hicieron una especie de criadero para los que sobreviven.

translation.en: People that have defected say it's worse than hell,
translation.es: Los que escaparon dicen que es peor que el infierno.

translation.en: humans becoming some kind of surrogate incubators for the alien young.
translation.es: Los humanos se vuelven incubadoras para las crías alienígenas.

translation.en: They killed us in waves when they first arrived.
translation.es: Nos fueron matando en oleadas cuando llegaron.

translation.en: They built these megastructures that spew methane,
They've sown their crops, snuffing out our plant life,
translation.es: Plantaron sus cultivos y, con ello, murió la vegetación,

translation.en: raising the global temperature, causing our cities to flood.
translation.es: aumentó la temperatura global, se inundaron las ciudades.

translation.en: They waged war on Earth. They set fire to our forests.
translation.es: Libraron una guerra contra la Tierra. Incendiaron los bosques.

translation.en: impossible to breathe if you are close to the stacks.
translation.es: Y es imposible si estás cerca de esas construcciones.

translation.en: they hack into our psyche, into our minds, paralyzing us,
translation.es: Se meten en nuestra psiquis, en nuestra mente. Nos paralizan.

translation.en: taking control of the cerebrum and the limbic system,
translation.es: Controlan nuestro cerebro y sistema límbico

translation.en: We've been able to design a brain barrier that protects us from their influence.
translation.es: Logramos diseñar una barrera cerebral que nos protege de su influencia.

translation.en: They know we can't produce enough of these for everyone,
translation.es: Saben que no podemos hacer suficientes para todos,

translation.en: that it's just a matter of time before the entire planet is theirs.
translation.es: que es solo cuestión de tiempo hasta que todo el planeta sea suyo.
juntamos fuerza para salir a pelear.

translation.en: I wonder if deep down, each person knows we're already dead.
translation.es: Me pregunto si, en el fondo, todos sabemos que ya morimos.

translation.en: I wonder if only one, sick, primordial instinct
translation.es: Y si es solo un instinto primordial enfermizo
lo que nos hace seguir avanzando sin rumbo.

translation.en: Every rational thought tells us it's over.
translation.es: El pensamiento racional nos dice que todo acabó.

translation.en: Every vile, deceptive, chemical emotion tells us it isn't.
translation.es: Pero nuestras viles y engañosas emociones químicas nos dicen que no.

translation.en: We are sold a different story by our politicians.
translation.es: Nuestros políticos nos vendieron otra historia.

translation.en: Come with us! Do not be afraid!
- They want what's best for us! - Come on.
They have built a conservatory for us!
Come on, you freaky- faced fuck. Come on.
Come on, come on, come on.
I'll go to the new conservatory.
Every once in a while, something goes our way.
translation.es: De vez en cuando, algo sale bien.

translation.en: Just one in a thousand. Just enough to keep fighting.
translation.es: Solo una de mil veces. Lo suficiente para seguir luchando.

translation.en: Even for small victories, it seemed that everything was lost.
translation.es: Aun con esas pequeñas victorias, todo parecía estar perdido.

translation.en: Humanity would soon cease to exist.
translation.es: Pronto la humanidad dejaría de existir.

translation.en: like angels carried on the rays of the aurora borealis.
translation.es: como ángeles, montados en los rayos de la aurora boreal.
El nuevo mundo cambió a todos.

translation.en: Adapt or die, it was as simple as that.
translation.es: Adaptarse o morir, era tan simple como eso.

translation.en: In the old world, Nosh would have been locked up.
translation.es: En el viejo mundo, Nosh habría sido encerrado.

translation.en: but here, he not only survived, he thrived.
translation.es: Pero aquí no solo sobrevivía, sino que prosperaba.

translation.en: Nosh could make just about anything out of scavenged junk.
translation.es: Nosh podía hacer cualquier cosa con la chatarra que juntaba.
Bombas, barreras cerebrales o lo que fuera.

translation.en: We needed him, and he knew it.
No. We need more than that.
And payment? You can do the usual?
Everything has a price, and we can pay you.
translation.es: Todo tiene un precio, y podemos pagarte.

translation.en: I'm glad these fucking things came here.
translation.es: Me alegra que hayan venido esos malditos aliens.

translation.en: They mean that I get to burn whatever I see.
translation.es: Ahora puedo quemar todo lo que veo.

translation.en: Every day. Every night. No laws. No fucking jails.
translation.es: Todos los días, todas las noches. No hay leyes ni cárceles de mierda.

translation.en: What is it with you and the fucking fire?
I'll die and perish in the fire someday.
translation.es: Pereceré en el fuego algún día.

translation.en: You say you need my help? For what?
For a fucking hope for things to go back to the way they were?
translation.es: ¿Por una puta esperanza de que todo vuelva a ser como antes?

translation.en: Just give me… give me some bait.
I just need some bait, some of your people…
translation.es: Necesito carnada, algunos de los suyos.

translation.en: some of your people, some of the sick you don't need--
translation.es: Necesito carnada, algunos de los suyos. Los enfermos, no los necesitan.

translation.en: I'm two seconds away from blowing this motherfucker's head off.
translation.es: ¡Estoy a dos segundos de volarle la cabeza a este malnacido!

translation.en: It would be so good. So much fun. Just a little more!
translation.es: Estaría muy bueno. Sería divertido. ¡Solo un poco más!

translation.en: Give me some bait. Give me some bait. It'll make the boom bigger.
translation.es: Denme algo de carnada. Así el bum será más grande.

translation.en: I'll take out an entire convoy. That'll help you, right?
translation.es: Destruiré un convoy entero. Eso será de ayuda, ¿no?

translation.en: I have enough ordnance to make this fire breathe hot.
translation.es: Tengo suficiente artillería para hacer que el fuego se expanda. Es caliente.

translation.en: Some sick people in exchange for Nosh's item.
translation.es: Algunos enfermos a cambio del artefacto de Nosh.

translation.en: In peacetime, such an offer would be insane.
translation.es: En tiempos de paz, tal cosa sería una locura,

translation.en: Ma'am, we've done everything we can. He's not responding.
translation.es: Hicimos todo lo posible, jefa. No responde.

translation.en: We picked up Amir in Sector 7.
translation.es: Encontramos a Amir en el Sector 7.

translation.en: At first, they thought he was dead, some refuse from one of their experiments.
translation.es: Al principio, pensaron que estaba muerto, que era el desecho de un experimento.

translation.en: I'm not going to hurt you.
Kill him. Just fucking kill him.
translation.es: Mátalo. Ya mátalo. Le llenaron la cabeza de mierda.

translation.en: All that shit they put in his head.
translation.es: Ya mátalo. Le llenaron la cabeza de mierda.

translation.en: - He's not even one of us… - Stop.
I'm not going to hurt you.
We've gotta check the wounded, ma'am.  Okay.
translation.es: - Debemos revisar a los heridos. - Bueno.

translation.en: I need to ask you for a favor.

translation.es: y tú me haces un favor.

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay. It's fine.
I need to see what it did to you.
This world had changed all of us…
translation.es: Este mundo nos cambió a todos.

translation.en: To try to make it how it was before.
translation.es: Para tratar de hacer que todo sea como antes.

translation.en: To stop those beasts from doing more of this…
translation.es: Para evitar que esas bestias sigan haciendo esto.

translation.en: What is it with her and that fucking thing?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay con ella y ese maldito engendro?

translation.en: The ones that are experimented on, who survive…
translation.es: Aquellos con los que experimentan y que sobreviven…

translation.en: Her theory is, it's because they have some kind of predisposition.
translation.es: Ella tiene la teoría de que tienen algún tipo de predisposición.

translation.en: These men are trying to stop the genocide.
They don't have to die tonight.
translation.es: Pero no tienen que morir hoy.

translation.en: Help us. Please. Tell me what futures you see.
translation.es: Ayúdanos. Por favor, dime qué futuros ves.

translation.en: Incoming! Pulling in on your six.
You can help us turn the tide, Amir.
translation.es: Puedes ayudarnos a dar vuelta las cosas, Amir.

translation.en: Threat down in Fox Squadron. Threat down.
All right, everyone, triple- check those brain locks.
translation.es: Bien, vuelvan a revisar sus cascos.

translation.en: I don't want anyone looking at it,
translation.es: No quiero que nadie lo mire.

translation.en: and keep out of its line of sight, right?
translation.es: Y quédense fuera de su línea de visión, ¿sí?

translation.en: Do you see us winning, Amir?
Can we learn to hunt them?
Can we make them fear us?
Do you remember what they did to you?
They do experiments all day and all night.
That fucking thing! Don't let it get away!
But every once in a while, a miracle happens.
translation.es: Pero, cada tanto, ocurre un milagro.

translation.en: One in ten million, like you.
translation.es: Uno en diez millones, como tú.
Alguien que, de alguna forma, logra sobrevivir…

translation.en: Those things have given you an amazing power.
translation.es: Esos seres te dieron un poder increíble.

translation.en: Don't look at it! Look away!
You can do the things they do.
translation.es: Puedes hacer lo que ellos hacen.

translation.en: Put it down, Martinez! Put it down!
Don't do it, Martinez! Don't do it!
Amir, it's time. You have to use what they gave you.
translation.es: Amir, es ahora. Tienes que usar lo que te dieron.
